title: Modeling and Simulation of Turbulent Flows - Roland Schiestel
description:
Modeling and Simulation of Turbulent Flows - Roland Schiestel (Wiley-ISTE, 2008).pdf

ISBN: 978-1-84821-001-1

Focusing on the fundamental bases for developing turbulence models on rational grounds, this text considers different methods of approach--ranging from statistical modeling models at their various degrees of complexity to numerical simulations of turbulence--as well as basic concepts, the mathematical tools, and the methods for closure. Each method has its own specific performances, and limitations and they appear to be complementary rather than competitive
